short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyze the Google sheet and select the audience through Gemini for your next event.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Audience Selection: A Chrome Extension for Effortless Event Guestlisting.

Introducing Audience Selection, a Chrome extension that simplifies the process of selecting guests for your events!

Reduce Busywork, Maximize Efficiency:
1. Effortless Data Retrieval: Ditch manual list-building. Audience Selection seamlessly retrieves guest information directly from your Google Sheets.

2. Intelligent Filtering: Define your criteria (location, department, interests etc.) and let the extension do the work. It will filter your guest list based on your specifications, saving you valuable time.

3. Secure and User-Friendly: Our extension prioritizes data security and boasts an intuitive interface, making guest selection a breeze.
